name: The Army
description: The Gate of the Role of the Self - Leadership and guidance in direction

channel.name: The Alpha
channel.description: The Channel of the Alpha - A Design of Leadership: 'No Matter What'

signal.trigger: Called to lead but uncertain of direction
signal.script: Leadership isn't about having all answers—it's about holding direction. What direction can you hold with certainty?
experiments: Lead from your values, not your fears
Take one clear position on what matters
Guide others by example, not instruction

friction.trigger: Leadership burden or resistance to authority
friction.script: You're experiencing the weight of influence. True leadership includes knowing when to step back. Where can you share the load?
experiments: Delegate something you've been holding alone

breakpoint.trigger: Crisis of authority or leadership failure
breakpoint.script: This is not the end of your leadership—it's the death of an old leadership style. Your authority is being refined.
experiments: Study leaders who transformed through failure
Return to why you lead in the first place
